description.en:
The course is structured around "vertical" topics (problems) and "horizontal" topics (methods).
The vertical topics encompass a range of problems from sales, marketing and operations, such as product adoption, purchasing prediction models, understanding brand value of a company. 
The horizontal topics include data mining and statistical analysis topics:
* Data mining: Classification (e.g. decision trees), clustering (e.g. hierarchical, k-means), and prediction (using e.g. decision tree).
* Sentiment analysis
* network analysis
In addition, linear regression and logistic regression techniques will also be put to a more concrete applied use as the testing error will be minimized in industrial settings.
description.et:
See kursus on üles ehitatud "vertikaalsetele" (probleemid) ja "horisontaalsetele" (meetodid) teemadele. 
Vertikaalsed teemad kujutavad endast müügi-, turunduse ja operatsioonidealaseid probleeme: näiteks  toodete adopteerimise, sisseostu ennustamise mudeleid ja ostukorvi analüüsi. 
Horisontaalsed teemad kätkevad endas andmekaeve ja statistilise analüüsi alamjaotusi: 
* andmekaeve: klassifitseerimine (otsustuspuud, närvivõrgud, support vector machines), klasterdamine (hierarhiline, k-means ja biklasterdamine, iseorganiseeruvad kaardid), soovitussüsteemid (koostööline filtreerimine), ennustamine (kasutades otsustuspuid ja närvivõrke).  
*  klassikaline statistiline analüüs: multidimensionaalne skaleerimine, printsipiaalkomponentanalüüs, singulaarlahutus, korrespondentsanalüüs. 
Lisaks kasutatakse varemõpitud lineaarset ja logistilist regressiooni eesmärgiga lahendada konkreetseid tööstuslikke probleeme minimeerimaks testimisviga.

objectives.en: This course will enable students to apply statistical analysis and data mining techniques to address typical business questions in the fields of sales, marketing and business operations.
objectives.et: Kursus annab tudengitele oskuse kasutada statistilise analüüsi ja andmekaeve tehnikaid lahendamaks äriprobleeme, mis on seotud müügi, turunduse ja operatsioonide aladega

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students will able to:
1. Identify and articulate different opportunities for using data analytics techniques to answer typical questions in the fields of sales, marketing and business environment.
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Tuvastama andmekaevetehnikate kasutamise võimalusi  ning sõnastama müügi, turunduse ja operatsioonide alaseid tüüpküsimusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Use the Python programming language and associated libraries and tools to analyse business data in order to provide evidence-based answers to a range of business questions.
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Kasutama programmeerimiskeeli R (või Python) ning nendega seotud töövahendeid, et osata  analüüsida ärilisi andmeid ja seega anda tõenduspõhiseid vastuseid ärilistele probleemidele.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Understand the cross-applicability of data analytics techniques - e.g. the across the board use of association analysis for finding prevalent relationships in two-way two-mode data tables; or the ability to identify predicting churn of customers.
learning_outcomes.et: 3. Mõistma andmeanalüütiliste tehnikate ristkasutuse võimalusi, näiteks seda, et assotsiatsioonireegleid saab rakendada seoste leidmiseks ka kahemõõtmelises andmetabelis või võimalust identifitseerida rist- ja ülesmüügi võimalusi iseorganiseeruvate kaartide klasterdustulemustest.

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Combine multiple data analytics techniques to provide multi-faceted answers to business questions.
learning_outcomes.et: 4. Kombineerima ansambelmeetodeid, mis annavad ammendavaid vastuseid ärilistele küsimustele.

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Understand the benefits, costs and ethical implications of investing into data analytics as a tool for business analysis and development.
learning_outcomes.et: 5. Mõistma analüütika tööriistadesse investeerimise tähtsust, kasumlikkust ja eetilisi tähendusi, et kasutada seda ärianalüüsil ja selle arendamisel.

notes.et: Kursus koosneb 16 kohtumisest, millest 8 on loengud ja 8 praktikumid. Loenguid ega praktikume ei salvestata.

independent_work.et:
Homeworks: There will be in total 7 homeworks. In total consisting of 70 points.
Homeworks will not be evaluated and no marks will be given for the homeworks that are handed in after the announced deadline. Please check the moodle for more information.

description.et: 10 points are the maximum for each homework out of 7.

grade_evaluation.et:
There will be two assessment items:
* Homeworks (70 points)
* Final exam (30 points)
The resulting grade (out of 100) will be mapped to a grade between A and F using the standard University scale. You need to get in total at least 51 (homeworks + final exam) and a student has to earn at least 12 points during the Final exam to get pass. 
A deferred exam will be offered to students who are unable to attend the first exam.

debt_elimination.et: A deferred exam will be offered to students who are unable to attend the first exam or fail to get at least 12 points for the exam.

assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.et:
The course will consist of 8 lessons covering 8 topics. Each topic is first introduced during the lecture that is followed by the practice session.

1.Introduction
2.Tools: descriptive analysis and visualization
3.Customer segmentation
4.Customer Lifecycle management - regression problems
5.Customer Lifecycle management - classification problems
6. Cross-sell/Up-sell recommendations
7. A/B testing in marketing
8. Guest Lecture and Exam Preparation
